entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
